subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Sources: Thompson to take big step toward White House run

05/30/07 02:46 PM, EDT
Former U.S. Sen. Fred Thompson will take a major step toward a 2008 run for the White House by "testing the waters" -- beginning to raise money and hire campaign staff as early as Friday, several sources close to Thompson told CNN.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Your e-mails: Will U.S. sanctions on Sudan work?

05/30/07 02:26 PM, EDT
President Bush imposed new sanctions this week against the Sudanese government for its refusal to stop violence against civilians in Darfur. The sanctions are aimed at 31 companies owned or controlled by the Sudanese government, banning them from doing business with the United States or U.S. companies.
FULL STORY
